src:
【Beauty Within】10適合乾性肌膚的推薦產品

01 Nov 2019, 22:38

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】【Beauty Within】10適合乾性肌膚的推薦產品：今天的節目將為大家介紹適合溷合偏乾、易缺水肌膚的「此生摯愛保養品」。這種肌膚類型通常伴隨著乾燥粗糙、緊蹦脫皮、T字部位出油等不適狀況，選擇溫和成分和加強保濕是關鍵。我們也將推薦大家一些有助於修護皮膚屏障的保養成分，包括艾草、玻尿酸、積雪草等。



 
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102698266.html
text:
[Beauty Within] 10 recommended products for dry skin

01 Nov 2019, 22:38

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 02, 2019] [Beauty Within] 10 recommended products for dry skin: Today's program will introduce you to the "this life care products" suitable for dry and easy to lack skin. This type of skin is usually accompanied by dryness, roughness, peeling, and oily appearance in the T-zone. It is essential to choose mild ingredients and enhance moisturization. We will also recommend some maintenance ingredients that help to repair the skin barrier, including wormwood, hyaluronic acid, and centella.




This article URL: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102698266.html
